languages.text: "Госпожа Кибелла, пощадите мое старое сердце — еще немного, и я вас удочерю".
"Mistress Kibellah, spare an old man's heart — any more of that and I'll have to adopt you."
languages.original_text: "Госпожа Кибелла, пощадите мое старое сердце — еще немного, и я вас удочерю".

traits.locale_text: "Mistress Kibellah, spare an old man's heart — any more of that and I'll have to adopt you."
"Mistress Kibellah, spare an old man's heart — any more of that and I'll have to adopt you."
"Mistress Kibellah, spare an old man's heart — any more of that and I'll have to adopt you."
"Mistress Kibellah, spare an old man's heart — any more of that and I'll have to adopt you."
"Mistress Kibellah, spare an old man's heart — any more of that and I'll have to adopt you."

languages.text: "Herrin Kibellah, verschont das Herz eines alten Mannes. Wenn Ihr so weitermacht, muss ich Euch noch adoptieren."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Kibellah, spare an old man's heart — any more of that and I'll have to adopt you."

traits.locale_text: "Herrin Kibellah, verschont das Herz eines alten Mannes. Wenn Ihr so weitermacht, muss ich Euch noch adoptieren."

languages.text: « Maîtresse Kibellah, veuillez ménager mon pauvre cœur de vieillard, je vous prie. Encore un mot de ce genre, et je me verrai contraint de vous adopter. »
languages.original_text: "Mistress Kibellah, spare an old man's heart — any more of that and I'll have to adopt you."

traits.locale_text: « Maîtresse Kibellah, veuillez ménager mon pauvre cœur de vieillard, je vous prie. Encore un mot de ce genre, et je me verrai contraint de vous adopter. »

languages.text: «Maestra Kibellah, tenga piedad de este anciano. Si sigue así, me veré obligado a adoptarla».
languages.original_text: "Mistress Kibellah, spare an old man's heart — any more of that and I'll have to adopt you."

traits.locale_text: «Maestra Kibellah, tenga piedad de este anciano. Si sigue así, me veré obligado a adoptarla».

languages.text: 「キベラ様、年寄りを驚かせないでください。あなたを養子にしなければいけなくなります」
languages.original_text: "Mistress Kibellah, spare an old man's heart — any more of that and I'll have to adopt you."

traits.locale_text: 「キベラ様、年寄りを驚かせないでください。あなたを養子にしなければいけなくなります」

languages.text: “绮贝菈女士，我这个老人的心脏实在是受不了了。要是你再这么说下去，我就必须要把你收为养女了。”
languages.original_text: "Mistress Kibellah, spare an old man's heart — any more of that and I'll have to adopt you."

traits.locale_text: “绮贝菈女士，我这个老人的心脏实在是受不了了。要是你再这么说下去，我就必须要把你收为养女了。”

languages.original_text: "Mistress Kibellah, spare an old man's heart — any more of that and I'll have to adopt you."

languages.text: "Kibellah Hanım, bu ihtiyar adamın yüreğine indirme. Biraz daha böyle şeyler anlatırsan seni evlat edineceğim."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Kibellah, spare an old man's heart — any more of that and I'll have to adopt you."
